path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Coinfabrik/Security Audit for Patientory (PTOY) Token ICO - CoinFabrik Blog.pdf

findings.title: ConstantOptimizerSubtraction
findings.description: A vulnerability in Solidity optimizer causing subtraction to behave incorrectly.

findings.title: Short Address Attack
findings.description: The transferFrom and approve functions are vulnerable to ERC20 Short Address Attack due to lack of onlyPayloadSize modifier.
